> Generative art app 🎨 built with ❤️ using p5.js

### 🏠 [Homepage](single-stroke.nazeh.me)

### ✨ [Demo](single-stroke.nazeh.me)

## Install

```sh
yarn
```

## Usage

```sh
yarn start
```

## Run tests

```sh
yarn test
```
